mapper.select: select Genre from Genres natural join History where UserID = #{userid} group by Genre order by count(Genre) DESC limit 1

select GameID, GameName, Platform, ReleaseDate, MetaScore, Publisher, MetacriticU, OfficialURL from Games natural join Genres where Genre = #{genre} and MetaScore>85 and OfficialURL IS NOT NULL order by ReleaseDate DESC, MetaScore DESC limit 5
